title: Some one log in to my acc
body: GUYS don't click that link and sign in (hack i think) .RIOT pls help us{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you were phished, Sorry to hear that.

First things first, you still have access to your account so that's a plus, I recommend changing your password ASAP, if you use the same password for your email account you should also change that. Same goes for ANY accounts associated with that email address.
